bibl.title: Ostraka varia. Tax Receipts and Legal Documents on Demotic, Greek, and Greek-Demotic Ostraka, chiefly of the Early Ptolemaic Period, from Various Collections.
bibl.note: O. Varia 1-62. - Tax Receipts from Elephantine (1-31A), from Hermonthis (32-38), of unknown provenance (39-41), from Thebes (42-52). - Receipt for the price of a building plot (53). - Three ostraka from Theban Tomb 373 (54-56). - Decisory temple oath from Jême (57). - Some early Roman tax receipts (58-62).
bibl.seg: VLEEMING S.P., Ostraka varia. Tax Receipts and Legal Documents on Demotic, Greek, and Greek-Demotic Ostraka, chiefly of the Early Ptolemaic Period, from Various Collections. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVI.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1994, 4°, xiii-172 pp., fac-sim. et 16 pll. ISBN 90-04-10132-2. Hfl. 185/$105.75.

O. Varia 1-62. - Tax Receipts from Elephantine (1-31A), from Hermonthis (32-38), of unknown provenance (39-41), from Thebes (42-52). - Receipt for the price of a building plot (53). - Three ostraka from Theban Tomb 373 (54-56). - Decisory temple oath from Jême (57). - Some early Roman tax receipts (58-62).

C.R. par Willy Clarysse, ChrEg 70 (1995) Nos 139-140, pp. 304-306. - Mark Depauw, Scriptorium 49 (1995) p. 229*. - Alexis D'Hautcourt, AntCl 66 (1997) pp. 555-557. - Friedhelm Hoffmann, Enchoria 23 (1996) pp. 188-193. - Brian Muhs, BASP 33 (1996) pp. 177-185. - Didier Devauchelle, BibO 55 (1998) coll. 372-387. - Edmond Van 't Dack, RHD 64 (1996) pp. 217-219.
